Info.Title: The Internship
Info.Writer: Vince Vaughn (screenplay), Jared Stern (screenplay), Vince Vaughn (story)
Info.Actors: Vince Vaughn, Owen Wilson, Rose Byrne, Aasif Mandvi
Info.Plot: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.
